description: Non-Material Amendment application to planning permission reference 4058/APP/2024/587 dated 05-03-2024 to vary Condition 2 (list of drawings) and Condition 3 (supporting plans and documents) to allow alterations to the internal layout of the building, amendments to window details, amendments to external doors, changes to plant enclosure, repairs to the roof of the building and amendments to the approved stair drawings.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 of planning permission reference 4058/APP/2024/587 dated 05-03-2024, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
THH-LDW-TF-00-DR-A-00-0000 Rev P05 Location Plan
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-00-DR-A-000120 Rev P022 Proposed Ground Floor Level
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-000121 Rev P018 Proposed First and Second Floor Level
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-RF-DR-A-000123 Rev P014 Proposed Roof Level
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-000210 Rev P017 Proposed Elevations 01 & 02
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-000212 Rev P014 Proposed Elevations 05 & 06
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-000213 Rev P02 Proposed Internal Courtyard Elevations
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-000211 P014 Proposed Elevations 03 & 04
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-000311 Rev P012 Proposed Section CC&DD
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-00-DR-A-250013 Rev P01 Door Type A
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-00-DR-A-250014 Rev P01 Door Type B
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-00-DR-A-250015 Rev P01 Door Type C
THHFP1-LDW-ZZ-00-DR-A-250018 Re
Condition 3 of planning permission reference 4058/APP/2024/587 dated 05-03-2024, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be occupied until the following has been completed in accordance with the specified supporting plans and/or documents:
Design and Access Statement THHFP1-LDW-XX-XX-RP-A-10001 Rev P06
Arboricultural Impact Assessment Report HFT/THH/AIA/01c 22nd Feb 2024
Heritage Statement December 2024
Noise Impact Assessment 201056 Rev A
Schedule of Condition 120937-100/MET/CBk 18 September 2023
Mould and Damp Repair Schedule, Dated 06/11/2024
Thereafter the development shall be retained/maintained in accordance with these details for as long as the development remains in existence.
REASON
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (March 2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 2 and 3, which are superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 4058/APP/2024/587 dated 05-03-2024, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
